messages.auto_workbench_guide:
Crafts items automatically.
The left grid is used to set the recipe, the right grid is the storage.
messages.placer_guide:
Places blocks right in front of it.
Needs redstone signal.
messages.harvester_guide:
Harvests the crop (or melon, pumpkin and sweet berries) right in front of it.
Needs redstone signal.
messages.transporter_guide: Transports items from the container in front of it to the container behind it.
messages.filter_guide:
Filters items.
The yellow slot is for configuration, the other slot will accept only the configured item.
